title: Legs, Wings, Fins, and Flippers
description: Animals move in many ways, and they use different body parts to help them get from place to place. Legs, Wings, Fins, and Flippers provides emergent readers the opportunity to summarize text and classify information. Photographs support the text.
reviewWords: chicks, fins, flippers, leap, slide, webbed
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information presented in text
